cahtchmsg: error trying to send the message.
brief: the bot sends a specified message to a channel.
man:
Use: $PREFIX$say [#channel] <content>.
The bot deletes the original message and sends __content__ to the channel __#channel__. The specified channel must start with "#". If no __#channel__ is specified, __content__ is sent to the channel the command was used in. If the specified channel doesn't exist, it is treated as a part of __content__.
